Message¶

class model.message.Message(message_type: SDMXThon.utils.enums.MessageTypeEnum, payload, header: SDMXThon.model.header.Header)¶

Bases: object

Message class holds the type of a SDMX Message, its payload and its header.

Parameters

  • message_type (class:MessageTypeEnum) – Enumeration that withholds the Message type for writing purposes

  • payload (class:DataSet) – Information stored in the message (Datasets or structures)

  • header (class:Header) – Header of the message.

property header¶

Header of the message.

headerCreation(id_: str, test: bool = False, senderId: str = 'Unknown', receiverId: str = 'not_supplied', datetimeStr='')¶

Creates the header for a Message

property payload¶

Information stored in the message (Datasets or structures)

setDimensionAtObservation(dimAtObs)¶

Sets the dimensionAtObservation in the Datasets

toXML(outputPath='', id_='test', test='true', prepared=datetime.datetime(2021, 3, 18, 14, 50, 33, 610341), sender='Unknown', receiver='Not_supplied')¶

Exports its payload to a XML file in SDMX-ML 2.1 format

property type¶

Enumeration that withholds the Message type for writing purposes

validate()¶

Performs the semantic validation if the Payload is all Datasets
